title: FAA announces new air traffic control system in hopes of taming busy skies - NBC News
description: The FAA will embark on an ambitious three-year plan to modernize America's air traffic control systems and phase out the "outdated technologies that are unable to meet" modern demands, officials said Thursday.

description: White smoke has risen above the Sistine Chapel, the signal that cardinals have chosen a new pope on the second day of the conclave.

description: President Donald Trump said Thursday that he would replace Ed Martin as his nominee for U.S. Attorney for the District of Columbia.

title: Land under the country’s largest cities is sinking. Here’s where — and why. - The Washington Post
description: The movement is slow — sinking on the scale of millimeters per year in the United States — but the effects accumulate over years.

title: Loomer targets new Trump surgeon general pick - The Hill

title: T. rex’s ancestors may have walked from Asia to North America - Earth.com
description: Researchers trace T. rex origins to Asia and megaraptors to Gondwana. Climate changes and predator extinction fueled their rise as predators.

title: You can now submit your claims for Apple’s $95 million Siri spying settlement - The Verge
description: A website has been set up for eligible Apple customers to apply for their share of a $95 million Siri snooping payout.

title: A 1970s Soviet spacecraft built to withstand Venus's thick atmosphere could crash to Earth this weekend - BBC Sky at Night Magazine
